void sevent::asiosocket::AsioSession::receiveEvents ( ) [virtual]

Add a asynchrone event-listener.

This method should return at once, and make the workerthreads receive the event.

Implements sevent::socket::Session.

Definition at line 110 of file AsioSession.cc.

void sevent::asiosocket::AsioSession::sendEvent ( event::Event_ptr  event) [virtual]

Send an event.

Blocks until the event and all it's data is completely sent.

Implements sevent::socket::Session.
